ModMetaData.name: ED-Excalibur
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 0.19.0.6 Discussion, Non Steam Downloads and GitHub Repositories of this mod is available at: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=37158
When a Strange Signal is detected by your colony, it triggers your symbiotic interactions with an Advanced Ancient Starship as you assist them bringing the ship systems back online from the brink of disaster in exchange for access to their advanced technology.
Features: * Shield Generators: Static Base Defences. * Personal Shields: Protecting Specific Colonists and Animals from damage * OmniGel: Allows Renewable Production of Resources * Transporters: move people and materials vast distances * Laser Drills: Drill deep into the surface to unlock the almost unlimited potential of Geothermal Energy. * Power Transfer: Provide energy over vast distances.
